metadata.title: CVE-2014-0215 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The blind-marking implementation in Moodle through 2.3.11, 2.4.x before2.4.10, 2.5.x before 2.5.6, and 2.6.x before 2.6.3 allows remoteauthenticated users to de-anonymize student identities by (1) using ascreen reader or (2) reading the HTML source.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
